profile.en:
A member of the Vigilante Crew responsible for protecting Trinity's students.

To combat the increasing number of attacks on Trinity's students at the hands of the other academies, Suzumi volunteered to patrol the streets to abate attackers. Often misunderstood as cold and unfeeling due to her strong sense of justice, she actually has a friendly side as well.
profile.jp:
トリニティ総合学園所属、生徒たちの安全を守る自警団のメンバー。

トリニティの生徒が他の学園に襲われる事件が頻繁に発生したため、これらを防ぐために街中の巡回を始めた。燃え上がる正義感のせいで冷たい性格だと誤解されがちだが、本当は優しい女の子。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
负责三一学生安全的自卫队的成员。

当三一学园的学生受其他学园袭击的情况变频繁，便马上为了阻止此事而开始认真到街上巡逻。
由于充满正义感的缘故，经常被误以为既冷静又​冷酷，但其实她也有善良的一面。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
三一综合学园所属，维护学生安全的自卫队的成员。

因为三一学生受到其他学园袭击的事件频繁发生而开始到街上巡逻。
由于火热的正义感而常被误会是个性​冷酷的人，其实是个温柔的女孩子。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
保护崔尼蒂安全的自警团成员。

因为崔尼蒂的学员频繁被其他人袭击，为阻止这种情况，她自愿进行街头巡逻。
充满正义感，所以常被别人误会成是不讲情面的人，其实她也有很温柔的一面。

hobby.jp: 巡回、散策

desc.en: 為了防禦三一學園周圍，三一也配合實現正義部、圖書委員會和自衛隊等各自的角色分別去讓一般民眾避難，以及狙擊敵人等。出乎意外的是，連茶會也參加了，戰況變得有些激烈。
desc.jp: 為了防禦三一學園周圍，三一也配合實現正義部、圖書委員會和自衛隊等各自的角色分別去讓一般民眾避難，以及狙擊敵人等。出乎意外的是，連茶會也參加了，戰況變得有些激烈。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 为了防御崔尼蒂学园周围，崔尼蒂也配合正义实现部、图书管理部和自卫队等各自的角色分别去让一般民众避难，以及狙击敌人等。出乎意外的是，连茶会也参加了，战况变得有些激烈。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 为了防御三一学园周围，三一也配合实现正义部、图书委员会和自卫队等各自的角色分别去让一般民众避难，以及狙击敌人等。出乎意外的是，连茶会也参加了，战况变得有些激烈。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 为了防御三一学园周围，三一也配合正义实现委员会、图书委员会和自卫队等各自的角色分别去让一般民众避难，以及狙击敌人等。出乎意外的是，连茶会也参加了，战况变得有些激烈。

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.jp: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 莲见、和纱、夏、铃美、爱理、好美等人加入战斗。

desc.en: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.jp: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第101首曲子，在最终篇第三章占领方舟的活动战斗任务里使用。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.jp: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往夏莱社团室。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往夏莱社团室。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往沙勒社团室。

desc.en: The welcome screen of the system. Multiple stories were flashing by.
desc.jp: The welcome screen of the system. Multiple stories were flashing by.
desc.zh_cn: 系统的欢迎界面，快速切换了多个剧情的内容。

desc.en: Rin explained some basic situation about Kivotos, and then led Sensei to the reception room.
desc.jp: Rin explained some basic situation about Kivotos, and then led Sensei to the reception room.
desc.zh_cn: 琳向老师说明了基沃托斯的一些基本情况，然后把老师带到了招待室。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.
desc.jp: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在招待室里，来自千禧年的优香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及歌赫娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达夏莱；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在招待室里，来自千年的优香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达夏莱；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在招待室里，来自千年的优香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达沙勒；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.jp: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第101首曲子，在最终篇第三章占领方舟的活动战斗任务里使用。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

hobby.jp: 読書、人間観察

hobby.en: Checking out dessert shops, tea parties.
hobby.jp: 美味しいスイーツ探し、お茶会
哲学書を読むこと

desc.en: A member of the Justice Task Force.
desc.jp: A member of the Justice Task Force.

hobby.jp: 「普通に」スイーツを食べること

hobby.en: Climbing to high places, keeping an observational diary
hobby.jp: 高いところに登ること、観察日記を書くこと

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

hobby.en: Collecting tea leaves, baking pastries, gardening
hobby.jp: 茶葉収集、お菓子作り、庭の手入れ
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 茶葉収集、お菓子作り、庭の手入れ
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 收集茶叶、制作点心、整理庭园
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 茶葉収集、お菓子作り、庭の手入れ

hobby.jp: ロマンチックなこと、思索
決闘申込み、自己紹介

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.jp: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。

hobby.jp: 読書、しおりづくり
読書、書籍の管理、古書の研究

hobby.en: Participating in events, collecting limited-edition desserts
hobby.jp: イベントごと、限定スイーツ巡り
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 参加活动、收集限定版甜点
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 参加活动、收集限定版甜点
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 参加活动、收藏限定甜点

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

hobby.jp: 計算

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
